comments.body: visionary idea
It would be so good and cool!
Might be useful

I disagree with this idea I like adding eagles as tamble mobs but dont like riding them maybe they could carry smaller animals for you similar to leash except they can only carry small mobs like a baby pig or a chicken maybe a parrot and other small mobs like silver fish
If it gets added to the game, it should be rideable

I like the idea, however, I don't believe that they should be ridable. In Mongolia, people use eagles to hunt for certain animals and as pets. Maybe after feeding it a specific drop from a mob, it can fly around, pick up the mob, and bring it to you and/or kill it and bring the drop to you after it is tamed.

I'd like to add that the ancient seed that maybe can only be found in special biomes (or even only in ancient cities whitch could be very hard aswell to bring the Sniffer to), and has to be planted and some sort of special treatment, like any sort of special lighting or maybe has to be around bees. but for all I'd like to have a huge waiting setion for the seed to grow fully, just because the Ravanger as a tamed Mob would be very puwerfull and a late game action, within that there could be made some extra Achievments. but its definitely a great idea.
I like the idea of a tamable ravager via ancient plants but the idea should be more balanced out
YES! This would be awesome. If not in the happy ghast update, maybe the next one.
and you should be able to use the ravager's attack moves on hostile mobs.
Mabe the Sniffer would find the Ancient Seeds in the nether.
Frost Walker AND Soul Speed please! Thank-you!
There probably needs to be a third tier of the enchantment to accommodate for the increased movement speed and so you don't overshoot the icepath accidentally
frost walker for horses will allow u to walk ur horse on water without having to carry it in a boat or with a happy ghast
Please add this. It will make horses more viable in the endgame

Animal armor should just be able to accept the enchantments of all types of armor, whether it be helmets, chestplates, leggings, or boots. I'm not saying every enchantment needs to be given to them, but just that enchantments from different armor parts should be able to be used.
Maybe you could make horseshoes and enchant them with frost walker.

Yeah I kind of thought it should be a free bedrock addon as well

But I do like the music disc idea though!
I just hope they remove that AI villager voice. It's not Minecrafty at all
Yeah I think so

Ok - with the villager voice

  1. It's not AI generated
  2. It's a classic sound in Minecraft
  3. And sorry, if you want to give feedback for that, you'll need to submit your own report.

I wrote the first comment here :)
Aww, the Villager singing was AI? That's a real shame; it would have been brilliant if there'd been a human singer behind it.

"Both stylistically and contextually this is a poor fit for base game Minecraft."

I wholeheartedly agree on this sentiment as well as the rest above it.

The villager voice in Minecraft is a classic sound and it has a 10% chance of being removed basically.

Plus it's not ai generated. Mojang make the sound with a human voice then highly customise it using some fancy devices.

Update - they've just released the music disc in the past few hours.

Mojang won't really remove things like this :(
I think it's just to make the update less monotonous. Otherwise, it will be the next 1.20.4 / 1.20.6 / 1.21.3

Plus it's not ai generated. Mojang make the sound with a human voice then highly customise it using some fancy devices.

Oh thank goodness! The villager singing is my favourite part.
Sorry, I can't agree with you.

Minecraft is about making your own story. It doesn't make sense to force a piece of a different story into the game, let alone in such a tacky way.

This Music Disc breaks suspension of disbelief too; just by interacting normally with a mob, you're reminded of a product that exists entirely outside of the game.

 

Please reconsider the addition of this feature. It's clearly controversial within the community.

I see no point in continuing to play a game that sacrifices its integrity like this.
I disagree. It's fun and I honestly don't see how it's detrimental.

I've made a new post for this under the "Blocks, Tools, and Items" category, where i've raised additional points, and where it isn't tied to Chase The Skies seeing as that update is now done. 

Vote on that post too so Mojang can see it. It's titled "The music disc Lava Chicken does not fit Minecraft"
I strongly disagree. The Lava Chicken disc is awesome
Too Late
i like the sounds and talking but not really the repairing vote if you agree
Iron golem gives a poppy to copper golem as a thank you please!

I was just about to suggest the same thing! It would be a useful way to automatically repair golems, while also being a really cute interaction. Maybe if iron golems get too heavily damaged, they could search for a copper chest so they can be repaired.

Agreed. The happy ghast is supposed to help with building floating structures, so ideally we shouldn't need to still build pillars up into the sky.

Sebenarnya ide yang bagus untuk peralatan dan baju zirah tembaga memiliki kemampuan teroksidasi namun pertanyaannya adalah bagaimana cara nya membersihkan peralatan dan baju zirah tembaga itu dari teroksidasi peralatan dan baju zirah tembaga kan tidak bisa diletakkan di dunia minecraft sedangkan blok tembaga dan penangkal petir bisa diletakkan di dunia minecraft untuk membersihkan blok tembaga dari teroksidasi blok tembaga harus di hit menggunakan kapak
Or it could make you immune to lightning
OMG great idea üí° I love it so much
Cool feature
Make it oxidise with its durability, would be cool for decorating
Copper items don't oxidize, so this doesn't make much sence.

Or change it so instead of soul sand or a bone block we need to use a dried ghast in the recipe and the outcome could be two dried ghasts. That way we can clone it instead creating it out of nowhere and we still need to find it by adventuring on soul sand valleys or bartering with piglins.

It's not the recipe that reduces the value, it's how commonly it generates under fossils. Which one is easier: Kill 16 ghasts (with looting III it's 4 ghasts) and make sure their tears don't fall into lava, or check two nether fossils in a soul sand valley?
Ghasts appear a lot and are easy to kill
I second the idea of "cloning" a dried ghast instead of basically crafting it, and removing the recipe altogether. I know it's a joke how Steve can "craft" life. But come on, crafting a ghast?
But how is it dry if it's hydrated by its tears? The recipe is not lore accurate. Maybe they should add a new ghast item, like ghast hide or something. But still, I agree.
I agree I'm not sure why they didn't do that
Maybe even redstone as well too!
I think Redstone could be a better alternative to Gold, but that could just be me...
I think this was more of a 4J developed feature on legacy console versions. But I may be wrong.
Boats should be stackable too
Being able to more easily store saddles would be nice.
as a equestrian lover myself,this would make SO much sense. we do it in reality,why cant we do it in MINECRAFT!
Unless they add customization like with armor trims, and enchantments.
Ey dass man Sattel nicht stacken kann, macht auch gar kein sinn. Es w√§re eine Bereicherung wenn Mojang das √§ndern w√ºrde.
Immo there must be a way to stop all baby mobs from growing and clocks could use and extra use so...
or CHANGE the happy ghast's texture to be CUTER and less creepy.
Could also apply to stones, copper and other slabs
Could also be made so that when you place two slabs together, when they are mined they are just dropped as a block
Yes! the recrafter should be a new workbench

They won't do this idea exactly. You can only get 3 slabs from crafting. So the ability to use 2 slabs is basically infinite wood. It'd be cool if they add it so u can uncraft items but this exact idea is highly unlikely.
i love this idea
Maybe it could be obtained from piglin bartering?

Immo it needs a way to be renewable, specially for servers. But yeah, the current recipe is too easy. Perhaps the recipe itself could include the dried ghast and the outcome would be two dried ghasts, that way you still need to find it but then you can duplicate it
I've seen multiple suggestions for ghasts dropping them or them being available through piglin bartering, both of which seem like good solutions.

I really like this idea, especially step 3. The copper golem is great, but it can't effectively sort into more than 10 chests at a time. Because the copper golem forgets what chest contain which items when it can't find  where an item goes, player maintenance is required. As the game progresses and the player gains more items, and this happens less. A good addition would be that when it knows that there are multiple chests that could hold the item in question, it randomly picks a chest, and if the chest is full, it needs a player to physically take the item from it and put it in a chest. Maybe it could emit a distressed sound and particles to notify players that it needs help.
Also it would be amazing if copper golems could service furnaces including fill buckets with lava and swap out furnace buckets
Excellent request, I love it, I hope Mojang reads your suggestion.
bumping this because i think everyone can agree that things we were told we'd get? we should get them eventually,,,
nah, hear me out, instead they shoot out healing snowballs at you
oh yeah this would make them even cooler
Mabye snowballs also ghasts are so hard to get back on top of
Ohh I like that Idea Maybe they could be yellow or pink or teal!
A nice peaceful library.
*copper.          but yes this guy is right they should have more resistance to explosions
and give (what im calling:) ominous mobs, copper armor. maybe with diamond trim?
and give (what im calling:) ominous mobs, copper armor. maybe with diamond trim?

im thinking copper armor could have a new enchantment called lightning speaker, which absorbes lightning, to be stored up, and used in a more powerful attack through copper weapons, or a channeling trident.

The big issue here is it would be massively weaker than other loot in there. Perhaps replacing the stone tools found in barrels with copper ones is good, but copper armor from the vault which can also give diamonds is quite weak in comparison
Beat me to it!  Seriously this would be AWESOME!!  Imagine if he could sort chiseled bookshelves too!  A little librarian sorting books with his extendable legs!

Players can build small subfloors/walkways for the golems to reach high up chests. But perhaps these legs could increase their reach to 3-5 blocks in a fun way that doesn't require the player to have one of the walways every two blocks (that wouldn't look nice I suppose).

I want all of them back, INCLUDING the Chinese Mob Vote losers.
Most players are aware of the mob votes that took place america and europe, but there was a special one for China that gets under represented in these mob vote loser discussions.

They had 1 Mob vote, where it featured 5 mobs, the Panda, Pink River Dolphin, Crocodile, Monkey, and Deer.
Panda won this vote, but I really wanna see the 4 losers from this mob vote comeback too.
Please add the Barnacle
Please add wizards and wildfire!

there's a lot that could and should be added to the game but to many mobs could take away from Minecraft's vanilla feel. I do think every biome should have at least two exclusive mobs like the polar bear and penguin for frozen oceans, monkeys and parrots for the jungle and maybe even pink river dolphins, a bear or deer for the dark oak forest.

perhaps even the mooshroom islands could have flowers and add the moobloom so its not all identical.
We need the tuff golem, it will make minecraft a better place
